chapter.title: Auxiliary Functions
chapter.para: Information on data types internally used by the library.

section.title: Dynamic Arrays
section.para: The darray_t data type manages an array of pointers of type void *, allocating more memory when necessary.

section.title: Symbol Tables
section.para: The symtab_t data type manages symbol tables where the keys are strings of type char * and the values are pointers of type void *.
At present, they are implemented inefficiently using dynamic arrays, but this will change if the need arises.
